items.title: AWS says it is developing the Fastnet subsea cable to connect Maryland and Ireland, aiming to launch by 2028 with a capacity of 320Tbps+ and buried ~1.5m deep (Emily Forlini/PCMag)
items.summary:
Emily Forlini / PCMag:
AWS says it is developing the Fastnet subsea cable to connect Maryland and Ireland, aiming to launch by 2028 with a capacity of 320Tbps+ and buried ~1.5m deep  —  Amazon Web Services (AWS) will lay a new subsea cable across the ocean floor, connecting Maryland and Ireland.

items.title: Regularly up to $200 ASUS ROG Falchion RX low profile 65% keyboard is down to $120 today (40% off)
items.summary:
We are now tracking a deal at Amazon that drops ASUS’ ROG Falchion RX low profile mechanical gaming keyboard down to $119.99 shipped. This is regularly a $180 keyboard that has fetched as much as $200 in recent months. That means you’re looking at a straight-up $80 discount on it today. We’ve seen the variant of this keyboard with red linear switches go for less, but today’s 40% discount marks the lowest price we have tracked for this variant with blue switches. It’s good for folks who want a mechanical keyboard but don’t like using a standard unit with a high typing angle, and you can learn more about it in detail below.

more…

Over at Woot, you’ll find Samsung’s 49-inch Odyssey OLED G9 (G95SD) DQHD gaming monitor down at $927.43 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise). This model usually retails for $1,900 at Samsung and was recently offered brand new for $980 in a short-lived Woot deal that’s now sold out. Today’s “New, open-box” offer is the next best thing that saves you a massive $973. What makes this listing even better and worth considering is that it comes with a 3-year warranty from Samsung, making this an excellent value for anyone eyeing a high-end ultrawide OLED upgrade this holiday season. Head below for more details.

Samsung Malaysia officially released its new pair of sound towers, the ST50F and the ST40F. Both speakers feature app-controlled dynamic lighting, multiple modes, and a portable, IPX4 splashproof design. According to the press release, both speakers deliver deep bass with “refined” acoustics that can be heard indoors or outdoors. Users can further adjust their listening […]

items.title: E-Hailing Drivers’ Monthly Fuel Quota Increased To 800 Litres Under BUDI95
items.summary:
Prime Minister Datuk Seri Anwar Ibrahim announced that the monthly fuel quota for e-hailing drivers under the BUDI95 subsidy programme has been increased to 800 litres, which is “equivalent to 5,000km”. This was announced by Anwar in the Dewan Rakyat during the Ministers’ Question Time session. He explained further that the decision to raise the […]

items.title: EGO’s 56V 24-inch cordless self-propelled two-stage snow blower with 7.5Ah batteries at $1,400 (Reg. $1,649), more
items.summary:
We’ve been seeing an increase in discounts on snow-clearing solutions across multiple brands lately, and Amazon is now offering the EGO Power+ 56V 24-inch Cordless Self-Propelled Two-Stage Snow Blower with two 7.5Ah batteries at $1,399.99 shipped. Normally going for $1,649 at full price, we haven’t seen very much by way of discounts dropping the cost back at or below $1,400 since April, save for the Prime Day fall to $1,350. While it has gone lower before April, you’re still looking at a solid $249 price cut here that gives you the best rate of the last seven months. Of course, if you want to save more, there’s the brand’s 56V 21-inch Cordless Snow Blower that comes with two 5.0Ah batteries at $699 shipped right now, as well as the 56V 12-inch Cordless Snow Shovel with a 2.5Ah battery at $269.99 shipped.

more…

items.title: Lawmakers say stolen police logins are exposing Flock surveillance cameras to hackers

items.summary:
We have now teamed up with the folks at Satechi to offer 9to5 readers a special early Black Friday offer that knocks a sizable 40% off its Apple Find My-equipped accessories using code 9to5BFCM at checkout. This includes the passport holder, keychain, glasses case, luggage tag, and the wallet tracker card we reviewed previously (it’s a good one). And at 40% off you’re looking at new all-time lows and some of the best prices to date across the board.

items.title: Let Yeedi’s S14 Plus or M12 Pro+ robots handle vacuuming and mopping at new and returning lows from $360 (Reg. $800+)
items.summary:
Update 11/3: Yeedi has dropped the price even lower on its S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop to a new all-time low of $549.99 shipped.

Through its official Amazon storefront, Yeedi is offering some serious savings on an array of robot vacuum/mops to upgrade your home cleaning routine. Among the lineup, which you can see in full here, we spotted the brand’s S14 Plus Robot Vacuum and Mop down at $599.99 shipped. This model was released with a $1,400 price tag back in March, but has since come down to a starting $1,200 rate, with discounts having kept the price down at $700 since mid-August. Now, you can score it lower than ever – even beating Prime Day pricing – as it’s getting a 50% markdown to a new all-time low price. For folks not looking to spend so much, there’s also the M12 Pro+ robot back at its lowest $359.99 shipped pricing too. You can learn more about these two models that I highly recommend below, or check out our hands-on S14 Plus review, as well as our hands-on M12 Pro+ review.

more…

items.title: How an ex-L3Harris Trenchant boss stole and sold cyber exploits to Russia
